languages.text: "Гнездо ксеномерзости". {n}Бледные губы кривятся.{/n} "Сей темный простор испытывает нас, нашу веру и стойкость. С мига, когда мы переместились сюда, я подвергаю свое тело аскезе и усмиряю плоть, дабы закалить дух. Советую и тебе поступить так же". {n}Леди Инцендия и впрямь выглядит еще более нездорово, чем обычно. Под запавшими глазами собрались глубокие тени, словно она голодает много дней.{/n}

"A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}

Советую и тебе поступить так же". {n}Леди Инцендия и впрямь выглядит еще более нездорово, чем обычно. Под запавшими глазами собрались глубокие тени, словно она голодает много дней.{/n}

languages.text: "Eine Brutstätte des Xenosabschaums." {n}Ihre bleichen Lippen zucken.{/n} "Diese dunklen Gefilde dienen dazu, uns zu prüfen, unseren Glauben und unsere Entschlossenheit. Seit unserer Ankunft habe ich meinen Geist mittels Askese und Entsagung gemäßigt. Ich würde Euch raten, dasselbe zu tun." {n}Incendia wirkt tatsächlich noch kränklicher als sonst. Die dunklen Schatten unter ihren eingesunkenen Augen erwecken den Anschein, als hätte sie seit Tagen nichts gegessen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. Seit unserer Ankunft habe ich meinen Geist mittels Askese und Entsagung gemäßigt. Ich würde Euch raten, dasselbe zu tun." {n}Incendia wirkt tatsächlich noch kränklicher als sonst. Die dunklen Schatten unter ihren eingesunkenen Augen erwecken den Anschein, als hätte sie seit Tagen nichts gegessen.{/n}

languages.text: « Un véritable repaire d'impureté xénos, {n}crache-t-elle en grimaçant.{/n} Ces confins ténébreux vont mettre notre foi et notre détermination à rude épreuve. Depuis notre arrivée, je n'ai cessé de fortifier mon esprit par l'ascèse et l'abnégation. Je vous invite à faire de même. » {n}Incendia a encore moins bonne mine qu'à l'accoutumée. Des cernes profonds soulignent ses yeux creusés, comme si elle n'avait rien mangé depuis plusieurs jours.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}

Depuis notre arrivée, je n'ai cessé de fortifier mon esprit par l'ascèse et l'abnégation. Je vous invite à faire de même. » {n}Incendia a encore moins bonne mine qu'à l'accoutumée. Des cernes profonds soulignent ses yeux creusés, comme si elle n'avait rien mangé depuis plusieurs jours.{/n}

languages.text: 「異種族の穢れの温床だ」{n}彼女の青白い唇が歪む。{/n}「この暗黒の地は、私たちの信仰と決意を試すためにある。到着した瞬間から、私は禁欲と自己否定によって精神を鎮めてきたのだ。あなたたちもそうするといい」{n}インセンディアの容貌は、いつにも増して不健康そうに見える。その沈んだ目の下には深い隈があり、まるで何日も食事をしていないかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の穢れの温床だ」{n}彼女の青白い唇が歪む。{/n}「この暗黒の地は、私たちの信仰と決意を試すためにある。到着した瞬間から、私は禁欲と自己否定によって精神を鎮めてきたのだ。あなたたちもそうするといい」{n}インセンディアの容貌は、いつにも増して不健康そうに見える。その沈んだ目の下には深い隈があり、まるで何日も食事をしていないかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «Es un hervidero de escoria xenos». {n}Frunce sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Estas regiones oscuras son una prueba para nosotros, nuestra fe y nuestra determinación. Desde el instante en el que llegamos, he estado templando mi espíritu a través de la ascesis y el sacrificio. Le aconsejo que haga lo mismo». {n}En efecto, la apariencia de Incendia es aún menos saludable que de costumbre. Puedes ver unas profundas sombras bajo sus ojos hundidos, como si no hubiera comido durante días.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es un hervidero de escoria xenos». {n}Frunce sus labios pálidos.{/n} «Estas regiones oscuras son una prueba para nosotros, nuestra fe y nuestra determinación. Desde el instante en el que llegamos, he estado templando mi espíritu a través de la ascesis y el sacrificio. Le aconsejo que haga lo mismo». {n}En efecto, la apariencia de Incendia es aún menos saludable que de costumbre. Puedes ver unas profundas sombras bajo sus ojos hundidos, como si no hubiera comido durante días.{/n}

languages.text: “这里是异形与污秽的温床。”{n}她苍白的嘴唇扭曲着。{/n}“这片黑暗的深渊是对我们的考验，会磨砺我们的信念和决心。从我们抵达这里的那一刻起，我就一直在通过苦行与克己来磨炼我的精神，我建议你也这么做。”{n}因森蒂娅的样子看起来确实比平时更加憔悴，她凹陷的双眼下面印着深深的阴影，看起来已经好几天没吃过东西了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这里是异形与污秽的温床。”{n}她苍白的嘴唇扭曲着。{/n}“这片黑暗的深渊是对我们的考验，会磨砺我们的信念和决心。从我们抵达这里的那一刻起，我就一直在通过苦行与克己来磨炼我的精神，我建议你也这么做。”{n}因森蒂娅的样子看起来确实比平时更加憔悴，她凹陷的双眼下面印着深深的阴影，看起来已经好几天没吃过东西了。{/n}

languages.text: "Zeno pisliklerinin kötülük yuvası." {n}Solgun dudakları bükülüyor.{/n} "Bu karanlık köşeler bizi sınamak, kararlılığımızı ve inancımızı sınamak için vardır. Buraya geldiğim andan itibaren iradem ve içimdeki inkâr ile ruhumu katılaştırıyorum. Sana da aynısını yapmanı önerebilirim." {n}İncendia gerçekten de her zamankinden bile daha sağlıksız görünüyor. Göçmüş gözlerinin altında, günlerdir hiçbir şey yememiş gibi derin gölgeler mevcut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A hotbed of xenos filth." {n}Her pale lips twist.{/n} "These dark reaches are meant to test us, our faith, and our resolve. From the moment we arrived, I have been tempering my spirit through ascesis and self-denial. I would counsel that you do the same." {n}Incendia's appearance really does look even less healthy than usual. There are deep shadows under her sunken eyes as if she has not eaten for a number of days.{/n}
